title: IGSN timestamps
description: Schema describing a subset of RFC3339 for IGSN timestamp formatting

date.description: A subset of RFC3339 dates, i.e. those given as YYYY-mm-dd. Note we don't do any checking of month/day/year validity, just whether the string is in the right format.

dateTime.description: A subset of RFC3339 date-time strings, i.e. those given as YYYY-mm-dd[THH:MM:[ss[.frac]]][Zoffset], in 24H format
